All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
AddAppointmentController
This class launches the AddAppointment screen and contains functions for user interaction with the screen.
AddCustomerController
This class launches the AddCustomer screen and contains functions for user interaction with the screen.
Appointment
This class creates Appointment objects.
AppointmentQuery
This class holds methods used to pull information from the database regarding appointment records.
AppointmentsController
This class launches the Appointments screen and contains functions for user interaction with the screen.
AppointmentTimeValidation
This class holds methods used to validate the times a user attempts to assign to an appointment.
Contact
This class creates Contact objects.
ContactQuery
This class holds methods used to pull information from the database regarding Contact records.
Country
This class creates Country objects.
CountryQuery
This class holds methods used to pull information from the database regarding Country records.
Customer
This class creates Customer objects.
CustomerQuery
This class holds methods used to pull information from the database regarding Customer records.
CustomerReportsController
This class launches the CustomerReports screen and contains functions for user interaction with the screen.
CustomersController
This class launches the Customers screen and contains functions for user interaction with the screen.
FirstLevelDivision
This class creates FirstLevelDivision objects.
FirstLevelDivisionQuery
This class holds methods used to pull information from the database regarding First-Level-Division records.
JDBC
This class holds methods used to connect and disconnect from the database.
LoginScreenController
This class launches the LoginScreen and contains functions for user interaction with the screen.
Main
This class launches the application and calls up the first Login Screen to be displayed to the user.
MainMenuController
This class launches the MainMenu screen and contains functions for user interaction with the screen.
SchedulesController
This class launches the ContactSchedules screen and contains functions for user interaction with the screen.
TimeHelper
This class holds methods used to convert time objects and create an observable list of times.
UpdateAppointmentController
This class launches the UpdateAppointment screen and contains functions for user interaction with the screen.
UpdateCustomerController
This class launches the UpdateCustomer screen and contains functions for user interaction with the screen.
User
This class creates User objects.
UserQuery
This class holds methods used to pull information from the database regarding User records.
